nodes.text: Grodon Lakky was a brutal, sadistic man who was placed in command of the slave pool at the Maw Installation. He derived great pleasure from breaking his slaves. However, he received no respect from his superiors.
Lakky was killed at the Maw Installation by Nawruun, who rose up against his master when Chewbacca freed the Wookiee slaves during the Battle of the Maw Installation.
